Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerMeter.description: This is the schema definition for a PowerMeter.
PowerMeter.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Power Meter for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of PowerMeter.
AssetTag.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Asset Tag of PowerMeter.

Current.description: An array of ID[s] of current sensors for this power meter.
Current.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of IDs containing pointers consistent with JSON pointer syntax to the current sensors for this equipment.

DateOfManufacture.description: The date of manufacture of PowerMeter.
DateOfManufacture.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual date of manufacture of PowerMeter.

FirmwareRevision.description: The actual Firmware Revision of PowerMeter.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Firmware Revision of PowerMeter.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of PowerMeter.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Hardware Revision of PowerMeter.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Manufacturer of PowerMeter.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of PowerMeter.
Model.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Model Number of PowerMeter.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of PowerMeter.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Part Number of PowerMeter.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of PowerMeter.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Physical Location of PowerMeter.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of PowerMeter.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Serial Number of PowerMeter.

Voltage.description: An array of ID[s] of voltage sensors for this power meter.
Voltage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of IDs containing pointers consistent with JSON pointer syntax to the voltage sensors for this equipment.

title: #PowerMeter.v0_2_0.PowerMeter
